LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_DaysActive_hint: This is the number of days you must survive until victory.
LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_TicksBetweenIncidents: These are the possible ticks between incidents. For your info: {0} ticks are one hour and {1} ticks are one day.
LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_RaidPointsFactorRange: This is the possible range for a raid point factor. This affects the strength of enemy groups. (Raid Points = Vanilla Raid Points * Random Factor in this Range)
LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_DangerLowHighDay_hint: These settings define the three stages of danger: Low Danger at the beginning, Normal Danger in between and High Danger close to the end.
LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_DangerTimeFactor_hint: The time factor is a factor to the calculated time until the next raid occurs. (Time = Original Time * Factor)
LanguageData.EndGame_ModOptions_DangerRaidPointFactor: The raid point factor is a factor to the calculated raid points for buying enemies. (Raid Points = Previously selected Raid Points * Factor)
